name: smart-forms
description: Uma biblioteca de componentes e hooks para facilitar a criação de formulários em React com validação

scripts.version:patch: pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-core version patch && pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-shadcn version patch
scripts.version:minor: pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-core version minor && pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-shadcn version minor
scripts.version:major: pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-core version major && pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-shadcn version major
scripts.publish:local: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-core publish --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @charbonnev/smart-forms-shadcn publish --no-git-checks
scripts.check: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test

author: Much
